theory: Sanji doesn't use knives or his hands in combat not because he can't, but because he wants to protect his hands at all costs since they are essential for cooking. The Wanze fight proves Sanji has exceptional knife skills that could make him even more deadly in combat, but he deliberately avoids using them to prevent any risk of hand injury.
author: Various One Piece fans
evidence: Sanji's exceptional knife skills demonstrated in Episode 259 against Wanze
Sanji's consistent refusal to use hands in combat throughout the series
His statement that a chef must protect their hands

theory: Wanze's weakness to spiral patterns (including Sanji's eyebrows) is a humorous reference to the horror manga 'Uzumaki' by Junji Ito, which features spirals as a source of supernatural horror and madness.
author: One Piece fans
evidence: Wanze's specific mention of becoming dizzy from Sanji's spiral eyebrows
The timing of this episode (2006) being after Uzumaki's publication (1998-1999)
